meanings.definition: Small strips of wood used in traditional Southwestern architecture for ceilings or fences.
meanings.sent1: The latillas added a rustic charm to the adobe house.
meanings.sent2: The latillas were carefully arranged to create a beautiful pattern on the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the latillas to build a tiny fort in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the latillas like playful whispers.
meanings.sent5: Under the warm sunlight, the latillas cast intricate shadows on the floor.

meanings.definition: A type of decorative paneling made from thin strips of wood.
meanings.sent1: The latillas on the wall gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The latillas were painted in vibrant colors to brighten up the space.
meanings.sent3: The latillas seemed to dance in the flickering candlelight, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were woven into the latillas, each strip telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The latillas whispered secrets of the forest, bringing nature indoors.
